course.subject: MATH
course.name: Reading Course: Deep Learning Methods and Applications
course.description: This reading course covers the following topics: 1. Single-layer Networks: Regression and Classification 2. Deep Neural Networks 3. Gradient Descent 4. Backpropagation 5. Regularization 6. Convolutional Networks 7. Transformers 8. Graph Neural Networks 9. Generative Adversarial Networks 10. Normalizing Flows 11. Autoencoders 12. Diffusion Models 13. Applications. Students should seek approval from the course instructor to take this reading course.
